required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Impact of Netrin-1 in the Pathophysiology of Placenta Accreta Spectrum
clinical_study.official_title: Impact of Netrin-1 in the Pathophysiology of Placenta Accreta Spectrum

brief_summary.textblock:
- To shed light on the possible involvement of netrin-1 into the pathophysiology of placenta accrete spectrum.
- To delineate the role of netrin-1, CD146 and MMP2 signaling pathway in the progression of invasion of placenta accrete spectrum.

primary_outcome.measure: impact of netrin-1 in the pathophysiology of placenta accreta spectrum
primary_outcome.description: Estimation of local placental netrin-1 protein expression by immunohistochemistry , 4. Estimation of local placental expression of CD146 in tissue homogenate, 5. Estimation of local placental expression of MMP-2 in tissue homogenate.

arm_group.description: group A : placental tissue of 30 patients with placenta accreta
group B : placental tissue of 20 normal pregnancy as a control group

study_pop.textblock:
1. Full history taking including currant age, age of marriage, parity, history of abortion , history of dilation and endometrial curettage(D&C), number of previous caesarian section, history of uterine congenital anomaly, postpartum endometritis, hysteroscopic surgery, previous abnormal placentation, and similar condition in the family.
2. Estimation of body mass index (BMI). 3- placental tissue obtained after delivery for immunohistochemistry and tissue homogenate analysis

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- ages between 20 to 40 years will be included.
- Gestational age: between 34 to 38 weeks.
- History of previous cesarean sections.
- Ultrasonographic findings suggestive PAS according to Jauniaux et al. (2018) :
- Loss of the retro-placental clear zone.
- Thinning of myometrium.
- Abnormal placental lacunae.
- Bladder wall interruption.
- Placental bulge.
- Exophytic placental mass.
- Doppler findings suggestive PAS according to Jauniaux et al. (2018):
- Subplacental hypervascularity.
- Uterovesical hypervascularity/bridging vessels.
- Vascular lacunae with turbulent flow/feeder vessels.
Exclusion Criteria:
Fundal and middle anterior or posterior placenta.
â€¢ Pregnancy associated with morbid conditions as: hypertension, diabetes mellitus, autoimmune disease, cardiac disease, renal disease, and endocrinal disease.
